item.description: HAPPY HOUR at the Stonewell Restaurant in Farmington starting at 5 pm. Come join us after work and relax with old and new friends. We?ll enjoy appetizers, fantastic company, and mix and mingle with other singles. There is no charge. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 354 Colt Highway: I-84W Exit 38 Bristol (Rt. 6W), about 1/4 mile on left OR I-84E Exit 37 (Fienemann Road), turn left, go 1/4 mile to Rt. 6, turn right, facility immediately on right.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at a table near the entrance.
item.why: You'll love it because we offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Happy Hour
